skills.name: Wind Enchantment
skills.description: [SP: 17][CD: 38s] Creates a field that boosts all allies within the AOE so that they gain 25% Attack Speed, 20% Move Speed, and damage by 10% Total DMG Multiplier to their attacks for 20s.

skills.name: Power of Wind
skills.description: Gain a Total DMG Multiplier buff based on the character's Move Speed bonus. Gain 5.0% Total DMG Multiplier for every 10% of Move Speed bonus (max DMG bonus: 50%). Character gains 30% Move Speed.
